entry.title: Unlock Your Creative Potential!
entry.summary: Welcome to Angelika Paints Art Studio Experience a creative journey at Angelika Paints Art Studio with personalised Individual Lessons in Painting,…
entry.content:
Welcome to Angelika Paints Art Studio

Experience a creative journey at Angelika Paints Art Studio with personalised Individual Lessons in Painting, Drawing, and Pottery, collaborative Small Group Lessons, immersive painting experiences encompassing vibrant landscapes to abstract expressions, guided drawing instruction including figure drawing and shading, hands-on pottery creation covering wheel throwing, hand-building, and glazing techniques, and elevate your artistic experience at the Special Events such as Sip and Paint Event, where no prior experience is needed to enjoy local wine, add your touch to canvas, and take home both your artwork and a local gift certificate.

Individual Lessons: At Angelika Paints Art Studio, we understand that personalised attention is key to unlocking your artistic potential. Our one-on-one art lessons provide the perfect opportunity to receive focused guidance and mentorship. Whether you're interested in painting, drawing, or pottery, our expert instructors will tailor the curriculum to your specific interests and skill level. With individual lessons, you can progress at your own pace and receive personalised feedback, ensuring that you make steady strides in your artistic journey. Contact us today!

Small Groups: If you prefer a collaborative and social learning experience, our studio also offers small group lessons. Gather a few friends, family members, or colleagues and embark on an artistic journey together. Our small group sessions foster a supportive and interactive environment, where you can learn from each other's experiences and create meaningful connections. Share the joy of art while receiving expert guidance from our instructors.
Contact us today!

Painting: Experience the joy of painting at our art studio. Whether you dream of creating vibrant landscapes, captivating portraits, or abstract masterpieces, our painting lessons cater to all styles and genres. Our experienced instructors will guide you through various techniques, from brushwork and color mixing to composition and texture. Discover the power of self-expression through paint and let your imagination soar. Contact us today!

Drawing: Discover the art of drawing at Angelika Paints Art Studio. Our drawing lessons cover a wide range of subjects, from still life and figure drawing to perspective and shading. Learn fundamental drawing techniques, develop your observation skills, and explore various mediums such as pencils, charcoal, and ink. Whether you're a beginner or looking to refine your drawing abilities, our instructors will provide guidance and support every step of the way. Contact us today!

Pottery:  Explore the tactile art of clay and learn the techniques of wheel throwing, hand-building, and glazing. From creating functional pottery to sculptural forms, our pottery classes cater to all interests. Our instructors will guide you through the entire process, from shaping the clay to firing and finishing your masterpiece. Get your hands dirty and experience the joy of working with this versatile medium. Contact us today!

Sip and Paint event! Guided Painting: Our talented artist will lead you step by step through creating your own masterpiece. No experience required! Sip & Socialise: Enjoy your favourite local wine (also non-alcoholic wine or juice) while connecting with fellow participants in a relaxed and friendly atmosphere. Let your imagination run wild as you add your personal touch to your canvas. All Art Supplies: Canvases, paints, brushes, aprons – we've got everything covered. 🥂 Complimentary Drink: Choose from a selection of wines, beers, or non-alcoholic options. Take-Home Art: Bring your creation home to showcase your artistic prowess plus a gift certificate to a local wine shop. Contact us today!

entry.title: Stories
entry.summary: All my paintings start with a story. The stories going through transformations and often take twists and turns until I…
entry.content: All my paintings start with a story. The stories going through transformations and often take twists and turns until I decide to finish it start a new story.

entry.title: Exploring
entry.summary: Fireworks in a glass Colour Exploration Corono Stuff Yum Sketchbook Texture in Grass Gelly print chalk Gelly print Butterfly wing…
entry.content: My art reflects experiences and feelings that influence me in large and small ways every day. Art tells a story with chapters reflecting people and events around me at a specific time in life.
